newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss bond market closing report.
newsitem.headline: Swiss bond market closing report.

text.p: Swiss bonds ended the day lower, reversing an early firm tone in afternoon trade.

U.S. retail sales were roughly as expected, showing a decline overall of 0.3 percent, while the Atlanta Federal Reserve's business index for April, published when Swiss bond markets were an hour away from the close, showed a rise to 22.1 from a revised 8.6 in March.
Swiss prices peaked by midday and hit their session lows late in the day.
Comi medium-term bond down two at 111.63
Euro Swiss francs down six at 98.18.
